      • connect

      • treatReceivedMessage

        public void treatReceivedMessage(Message message,
                                 User sender)
        Treat a received message (store it in the database and notify the graphical interface).
        Parameters:
        message - received message
        sender - sender

      • treatConnectionRequest

        public boolean treatConnectionRequest(java.lang.String requestingUserLogin,
                                      java.net.InetAddress requestingUserIPAddress,
                                      java.lang.String requestingUserMacAddress)
        Treat a received connection request or response (or a change login request). It consequently adds a user, or simply connect it and changes his pseudo depending on his current status.
        Parameters:
        requestingUserLogin - the login of the requesting or responding user
        requestingUserIPAddress - the IP address of the requesting or responding user
        requestingUserMacAddress - the MAC address of the requesting or responding user
        Returns:
        true if the requesting user wants a login change, false if the requesting user wants a connection. It is determined by checking if the requesting user exists and is already connect.

      • disconnectUser

        public void disconnectUser(java.lang.String macAddress)
        Disconnect the user having the given MAC address.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - the MAC address of the user you want to disconnect

      • sendAndStoreMessage

        public void sendAndStoreMessage(Message message,
                                User receiver)
        Send and store a message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message you want to send
        receiver - the user you want to receive your message

      • isLoginAvailable

        public boolean isLoginAvailable(java.lang.String login,
                                java.lang.String macAddress)
        Tell if the login picked by a remote user is available.
        Parameters:
        login - the login you want to check the availability of
        macAddress - the macAddress of the requesting user
        Returns:
        true if the picked login is available, false otherwise

      • notifyLoginDeny

        public void notifyLoginDeny()
        Notify the graphical interface to switch to login window because the connection was denied (login already used).
